price: Rabbimiz, indirdiğine iman ettik, peygambere tabi olduk, bizi şahit olanlarla beraber yaz!
arabic: رَبَّنَآ ءَامَنَّا بِمَآ أَنزَلۡتَ وَٱتَّبَعۡنَا ٱلرَّسُولَ فَٱكۡتُبۡنَا مَعَ ٱلشَّٰهِدِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā āmannā bimā anzalta wa-ittabaʿnā al-rasūla fa-uk'tub'nā maʿa al-shāhidīna
